detailsData.title: Specialized Knowledge
detailsData.content: Special Needs Law Group of Massachusetts brings a broad array of specialized knowledge in trusts, estates, and taxation. This expertise ensures comprehensive and tailored legal solutions for families with special needs.

detailsData.title: Nationally-Recognized Attorneys
detailsData.content: Our attorneys are nationally recognized and have been cited for public service by both the Massachusetts House of Representatives and Massachusetts Senate. They are graduates of prestigious law schools, ensuring top-notch legal representation.

detailsData.title: Personal Experience
detailsData.content: Many of our attorneys are special needs parents themselves, providing a unique and empathetic perspective. This personal experience allows us to better understand and address the specific needs of our clients.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Services
detailsData.content: We offer a wide range of services including estate planning, guardianships, and elder law. This ensures that we can support our clients through various stages of their lives with consistent and reliable legal advice.

companyName: Special Needs Law Group of Massachusetts
subHeading: Compassionate Advice for All Stages of Life
valueProp: More than 95% of our clients are families with special needs: parents, a sibling, sometimes the individual with disabilities himself/herself. Our clients come from every economic strata/background and various stages of their lives: business owners, employees, retirees, young parents, parents with children transitioning to adulthood at the same time as their parents are transitioning to dependency, and elderly parents themselves.
topics: Income Taxation of Trusts and Estates
